long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lightning Speed, where players race cars and compete in high-speed races. It's a racing game that tests driving skills.

Lightning Speed is a thrilling HTML5 game perfect for players who love fast-paced racing. Players take on the racer role in the game and must compete in high-speed races against other cars. The gameplay is on a scrolling screen, and the player controls their car using the keyboard.

The game's objective is to finish each race first and unlock new tracks and cars. Players must use their driving skills to navigate the routes, avoid obstacles, and outmaneuver their opponents. The game evolves progressively better hard as the races get faster and more challenging. Players must be careful to avoid crashing, or the game will end.

One of the critical features of Lightning Speed is its vibrant and colorful graphics, which are full of personality and charm. The game's easy-to-use controls and fast-paced gameplay make it perfect for players of all ages.


You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
